meanings.definition: The application of scientific knowledge for practical purposes.
meanings.sent1: Using technology, we can communicate with people far away.
meanings.sent2: The company invested in new technology to improve efficiency.
meanings.sent3: The technology in my toaster decided to stop working right before breakfast.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a complex web of technology, processing information at lightning speed.
meanings.sent5: The technology of a bicycle chain makes it move smoothly and efficiently.

meanings.definition: The machinery and equipment developed from the application of scientific knowledge.
meanings.sent1: The factory upgraded its technology to increase production.
meanings.sent2: The technology used in construction has advanced significantly over the years.
meanings.sent3: The technology in the old car sputtered and coughed, refusing to start.
meanings.sent4: His body moved with the precision of a well-oiled piece of technology.
meanings.sent5: The technology of a crane allows it to lift heavy objects with ease.

meanings.definition: The branch of knowledge dealing with engineering or applied sciences.
meanings.sent1: Studying technology helps us understand how things work.
meanings.sent2: Technology has led to many innovations in the medical field.
meanings.sent3: The technology of the experiment went haywire, causing a colorful explosion.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was a soothing balm, a technology that calmed the storm within him.
meanings.sent5: The technology of a microscope reveals a hidden world of tiny organisms.
